whitebalancemodes: Auto, Daylight, Shade,Tungsten light, Fluorescent light(D:Daylight Color, N:Daylight White, W:White Light), Manual
lens: RICOH lens, 9 elements in 7 groups (4 aspherical elements)
connectivity: USB2.0 (Hi-Speed): USB/AV terminal, HDMI terminal (Type D)
flashmodes: Flash-on and Flash-off modes. Red-eye compensation function employs a pre-discharge
focusrange: Standard: 0.4m - infinity / 1.31 ft. - infinity(entire zoom range);  Macro:0.1 - 0.5m / 0.33 - 1.64ft. (entire zoom range); 1cm Macro: 0.01 - 0.3m / 0.03 - 0.98ft. (Mid-zoom to telephoto);
